channel.title: Tech News Daily
channel.description: Your daily dose of technology news

item.title: Ruby 3.4 Released with Performance Improvements
item.description: Ruby 3.4 brings significant performance improvements and new features
item.content:encoded:
The Ruby core team has announced the release of Ruby 3.4, featuring:

  • 30% faster execution for common patterns
  • Improved memory management
  • New standard library additions
item.dc:creator: Jane Smith

item.title: XML Processing in Modern Applications
item.description: A comprehensive guide to XML processing in modern applications
item.content:encoded:
Despite the rise of JSON, XML remains crucial for many applications:

  • Document-oriented data structures
  • Complex namespace requirements
  • Legacy system integration
item.dc:creator: John Doe

item.title: Best Practices for API Design
item.description: Learn the essential principles of modern API design
item.content:encoded:
Key principles for designing robust APIs:

  1. Clear and consistent naming conventions
  2. Proper error handling and messaging
  3. Comprehensive documentation
  4. Versioning strategy
item.dc:creator: Alice Johnson

item.title: Introduction to XPath Queries
item.description: Master XPath for efficient XML data extraction
item.content:encoded:
XPath is a powerful language for navigating XML documents:

  • Select elements by path
  • Filter with predicates
  • Work with namespaces
  • Use built-in functions
item.dc:creator: Bob Williams
